location.des:
Like Route 18 at the southern end of Cycling Road, Route 16 runs directly east-west for its entire length. Five paces outside Celadon, a cuttable tree blocks a passage leading to the north half of Route 16. Several paces west of this spot, Route 16 narrows before widening just east of a gate. In this station, Trainers are forced to board their
Bicycle or, in the event that they do not own a
Bicycle, are forced to return east to Celadon.
